mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Campan, Mme (Jeanne-Louise-Henriette), 1752-1822
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sorry they can't visit and that the cause is friend's illness. Has he seen M. Sabatier? the celebrated surgeon in Paris. I intended to procure very pleasant walks to Mrs. Monroe to lead her to a party of ? which may be she never saw before. Hope she will come and Mr. ? will be soon better. I send you my receipt of the two ? Eliza works prettiliy. She cried the first day she came back saying she had lost of her writing since you absence from school. Her ? is her only defect.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Genet Jeanne Louise Henriette Campan to Pres. Monroe., no date
